info.name: WhatsApp blur lite
info.description:
Lite version of WhatsApp blur theme.
Full configurable version is here: WhatsApp blur Important! Please use Stylus extension instead Stylish extension because the Stylish not allow customize theme. If there is no change after clicking button "Instal style" on this page, please click on Stylus extension ico and find this style using "Find style" options. After install you can change style options by clicking cog ico beside the style name. Alternatively you can use this link to install style directly in stylus: Install style in stylus Enjoy!
info.additionalInfo: Github: WhatsApp blur Doc: WhatsApp blur doc Version: 1.0.4 - fix display separate contact list , - fix display tabs icon color and group icon text color in emoji popup window - fix display color in select contact tags popup window - add rounded corner in emoji popup window Version: 1.0.3 Fit theme to latest WhatsApp version Version: 1.0.2 Fix background colour in favourite emoji window, remove bgr in search input, remove border in message input Version: 1.0.1 Fix avatar size issue in "Reduce contacts" mode after app update Version: 1.0.0 WhatsApp blur release!

options.label: On
On

settings.label: Height offset - contacts ( 0 - 128, require Separate contacts ON)
Corner smooth - contacts ( 0 - 48, require Separate contacts ON)
Blur intensity - contacts ( 0 - 64, require Separate contacts ON)
